news.title: Specialist gardaí investigating ‘very serious sexual assault’ on woman in Dublin park
news.summary: Specialist officers form a garda divisional protective unit are investigating what is described as a “very serious sexual assault” on a female in a park the Dublin 4 area.

news.title: Teenage daughter of man who was murdered with samurai sword tells killer he deserves every second of life sentence
news.summary: A teenager told the man who killed her father with a samurai sword that he deserves every second of his life sentence.

news.title: ‘No 22-year-old should ever have to go through what Sam went through’ – Cian Prendergast hits out at criticism of his brother
news.summary: Cian Prendergast is set to start at No 8 against Portugal this evening for Ireland. It’s the third time this year he has been named in an Ireland match-day squad, yet he wasn’t well enough to feature in either previous game.

news.title: Man (30s) dies after being hit by a truck in Dublin
news.summary: A man has been killed after he was struck by a truck on Ballyboden Way, Dublin 16 this morning.

news.title: John Magnier threatened ‘litigation for years’ amid row over sale of Barne Estate, court told
news.summary: The wife of a man being sued by John Magnier over the purported sale of a Co Tipperary estate has told the High Court that the bloodstock billionaire allegedly threatened that the sale of the property to anyone else would put the defendants in “litigation for years" and "cost millions”.

news.title: Tanya Sweeney: My teenage exchange trip was a disaster because culture shocks and adolescence just don’t mix
news.summary: The exotic creature would roam our housing estate during the summer months. They wore sweatshirts in decidedly un-Blanchardstown colours like peach and mint.

news.title: ‘You’re going to die tonight’ – Man who attacked ex when he was a serving garda is jailed
news.summary: A man has been jailed for 20 months for attacking and threatening to kill his then partner in their home at a time when he was a serving garda.

news.title: Where Michelin-star chefs go to eat vegetarian dishes in Ireland: ‘Every dish feels thoughtful and complete, not just missing meat’
news.summary: If you didn't eat meat or fish, your options in most Irish restaurants were severely limited. If you were lucky, there might be a mushroom risotto or a spinach and goats cheese tart on the menu. But if you weren't, dinner was something hastily adapted from the meat menu.

news.title: Rare Condition Red Forest Fire warning issued as temperatures to soar to 30C this weekend
Irish beach etiquette: the 16 dos and don’ts of hot weather behaviour
news.summary: The sky is azure blue, the sun shining and a mini-heatwave will be in place across the country for the next three days.
